name: Smash Goblin
description:
SYNOPSIS

A very rich pirate captain is having a bored life and has no idea how to spend his money. Seeing his crew members arguing and fighting, he comes up with an idea: hold a battle royale in dangerous places. The reward is a ship full of treasure chests. This battle royale is called Smash Goblin and there are 2 very dangerous arenas: the Isle of the Dead and the Dragon's Nest. The Last One to survive gets the reward.

HOW TO PLAY

Movement is done with the left analog button or D-Pad on the Joystick and/or the directional keys on the keyboard. The player can interact with the anchor of his character or with the bombs that can be found in the scenery. Each bomb has an elemental effect, which can be fire, ice, or air.

The ice ability causes 0.5 damage and freezes whoever is hit, the wind ability causes 1 damage and slows whoever is hit, and the fire ability causes 1.5 damage.

With the anchor, the player can break the frozen crates and enemies, and can throw them away.

TARGET AUDIENCE

Game for casual gamers of frantic and time-pressed party games, with the possibility of getting in the way of your fellow opponents.

The game is intended for players aged over 10 years. It presents mild violence.

REQUIREMENTS TO PLAY

A minimum of two players are required to play the game locally. This version does not yet have the possibility of playing against rival bots, and there is no online matchmaking system.

Recommendation: Can be played with other players remotely through the external Parsec application.
